title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. V, subch. E, pt. 613 - Petroleum Bulk Storage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. V, subch. E, pt. 613 - Petroleum Bulk Storage

State Regulations

Subpart 613-1 - General Provisions (§ 613-1.1 to 613-1.16)

Subpart 613-2 - UST Systems Subject to Both Subtitle I and Title 10 (§ 613-2.1 to 613-2.6)

Subpart 613-3 - UST Systems Subject Only to Title 10 (§ 613-3.1 to 613-3.5)

Subpart 613-4 - AST Systems (§ 613-4.1 to 613-4.5)

Subpart 613-5 - Hydrant Systems (§ 613-5.1 to 613-5.6)

Subpart 613-6 - Delivery Prohibition (§ 613-6.1 to 613-6.8)

Subpart 613-7 - Release Response and Corrective Action (§ 613-7.1 to 613-7.8)

Subpart 613-8 - Financial Responsibility (§ 613-8.1 to 613-8.7)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. V, subch. E, pt. 613

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§
1-0101, 3-0301, 3-0303, 17-0301, 17-0303, 17-0501, 17-1001-17-1017, 17-1743; Navigation Law, §§ 173, 175, 176, 178, 191

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
